mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEV_BOARD( BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES( DEV_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{board_title} , #{board_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_DATE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM DEV_BOARD )MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NUM) FROM DEV_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM > 0
SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_DATE FROM DEV_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
